pricesheet_df = pricesheet_df.withColumn('unitQuantity', F.split('unitOfMeasure', ' ')[0])

hub_df = cost_df \
    .select('ServiceType', 'AHB', 'VCores', 'VCPUs', 'MeterCategory', 'MeterSubCategory', 'Date', 'Quantity', 'ProductName', 'ResourceId') \
    .groupBy('ServiceType', 'AHB', 'VCores', 'VCPUs', 'MeterCategory', 'MeterSubCategory', 'Date', 'ProductName', 'ResourceId') \

SELECT
    --TOP 100 
    ai_ServiceType as ServiceType, 
    ai_AHB as AHB, 
    ai_vCores as vCores, 
    ai_VCPUs as VCPUs, 
    MeterCategory,
    MeterSubCategory,
    format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Short Date], 
    sum(Quantity) as Quantity,
    --PartNumber,
    ProductName,
    ResourceId
    
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/202*/Extended_v2_ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE (MeterCategory = 'SQL Managed Instance' and ai_AHB = 'True') 
or (MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses' and MeterSubCategory LIKE '%Hybrid%') 
and format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') >= '2022-11' and format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') <= '2023-10' 
--WHERE JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') = 'True' or MeterSubCategory LIKE '%Hybrid%'

-----Below line extracts non HUB SQL entries for testing & investigation purposes
--WHERE (MeterCategory = 'SQL Managed Instance' and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') = 'False') or (MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses' and MeterSubCategory NOT LIKE '%Hybrid%') and Product LIKE 'SQL Server%' and Product NOT LIKE 'SQL Server Express%'

GROUP BY  ai_ServiceType, ai_AHB, ai_vCores, ai_VCPUs, MeterCategory, MeterSubCategory, format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), ProductName, ResourceId
ORDER BY format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), Quantity DESC
